UpdateLog.description:
[title]Recent News[/title][font]Small[/font]
[title]Balance Changes[/title][font]Small[/font] [b]Rowboat (Buildable)[/b] - Reduced MaxHitPoints from 10000 to 50 - Increased WorkToBuild from 30 to 200 - Changed costList from 1 ComponentIndustrial to 35 WoodLog - Increased Flammability from 0.05 to 0.65 [b]Rowboat (Vehicle)[/b] - Decreased CargoCapacity from 300 to 75 - Decreased MarketValue from 250000 to 85 - Increased Flammability from 0 to 0.65 - Decreased Mass from 10000 to 35
[b]Fishing Boat (Buildable)[/b] - Reduced MaxHitPoints from 10000 to 250 - Increased WorkToBuild from 30 to 1500 - Changed costList from 35 ComponentIndustrial and 3000 Steel to 140 WoodLog - Increased Flammability from 0.05 to 0.65 [b]Fishing Boat (Vehicle)[/b] - Decreased MarketValue from 250000 to 250 - Increased Flammability from 0 to 0.65 - Decreased Mass from 10000 to 200
[b]Sparrow (Buildable)[/b] - Reduced MaxHitPoints from 5000 to 750 - Increased WorkToBuild from 30 to 85000 - Changed costList from 35 ComponentIndustrial and 3000 Steel to 12 ComponentSpacer, 500 Steel, and 250 Plasteel [b]Sparrow (Vehicle)[/b] - Decreased MarketValue from 250000 to 175000 - Decreased Mass from 25000 to 6200
- Removed VehicleTurrets, they were for testing only and the main focus for now will just be normal flying (not strafing or bombing runs) [title]Bug Fixes[/title][font]Small[/font] - Fixed bug where GenSteps would attempt to recalculate vehicle path cost when regions had not been built yet. (Fixes compatibility with Biomes Core mods)
- Fixed bug where arriving skyfallers would attempt to notify VehicleTracks comp a tick after its removal. [title]Additional Changes[/title][font]Small[/font] - Removed irrelevant ResearchProjectDefs
- Performance improvements to VehicleTurrets.
- Added 2 ResearchProjectDefs for Rowboat and FishingBoat. More will follow later when the mod is closer to releasing.
- Improved VTOL animation of Sparrow
- Changed vertical ticks to instead be a property of individual launch or land properties, allowing you to designate different tick counts for landing and launching vertical animations. [title]Final Notes[/title][font]Small[/font] Please report any issues you find [link]https://github.com/SmashPhil/Vehicles/issues[/link](here.) or on the discord server.
